alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 08 at 3:43PM HST until February 11 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES... .Large fetch area upstream of the islands, generated by strong persistent trade winds, will produce advisory level surf along east facing shores over the next couple of days. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 7 to 10 feet tonight and 8 to 12 feet Thursday. * WHERE...Olomana, Maui Windward West, Kauai East, Koolau Windward, Molokai Windward, Molokai North, Maui Central Valley North, Windward Haleakala, Big Island East and Big Island North. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
